sentences.english: Gianna Jun puts on a brave show in her Hollywood debut.
sentences.chinese: 全智賢在她好萊塢的處女作中表現英勇。

sentences.english: Allah made virgins to be lovers and friends to those on his right hand.
sentences.chinese: 真主讓處女作這些人的情人和右手一樣的朋友。

sentences.english: Wind Flower Snow Moon is his first director film.
Look at my word not solitary WuTu "work".
sentences.chinese: 請看吾道不孤處女作《巫途》。

sentences.english: The film will be Chow's directorial and acting debut in Hollywood.
sentences.chinese: 這將是周星馳在好萊塢執導並出演的處女作。

sentences.english: Angelina made her movie debut at the tender age of seven.
sentences.chinese: 安吉麗娜在七歲那年出演了她的處女作。
